Creating an API

# 

<span key="ae02dc6dfc1e4de58099c5340e03711f"><span offset-key="ae02dc6dfc1e4de58099c5340e03711f:0">Creating an API</span></span>

<span key="391546e5ab6242a39e9262de6ceb9f24"><span offset-key="391546e5ab6242a39e9262de6ceb9f24:0">To start using the API Builder, you can create a new API in your workspace. You can also rename or delete existing APIs.</span></span>

## 

<span key="ee261e7963364b23a9841b5ecf13e77d"><span offset-key="ee261e7963364b23a9841b5ecf13e77d:0">Creating an API</span></span>

1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
    <span key="bb0bf41c9c194187ab28ead967d35b95"><span offset-key="bb0bf41c9c194187ab28ead967d35b95:0">Open </span>**APIs**<span offset-key="bb0bf41c9c194187ab28ead967d35b95:2"> from the left sidebar in Postman. You can open and edit any existing APIs from here.</span></span>

2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
    <span key="40aecef6c52f4a3db31a2bf604e68cda"><span offset-key="40aecef6c52f4a3db31a2bf604e68cda:0">Select </span>**New**<span offset-key="40aecef6c52f4a3db31a2bf604e68cda:2">, then select </span>**API**<span offset-key="40aecef6c52f4a3db31a2bf604e68cda:4"> or select </span>**+**<span offset-key="40aecef6c52f4a3db31a2bf604e68cda:6">.</span></span>

    > <span key="f0a63f77df7c48bd9bdd8bc8c089e975"><span offset-key="f0a63f77df7c48bd9bdd8bc8c089e975:0">You must be signed in to your Postman account to take this action.</span></span>

3.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">3.</span>
    <span key="d03aee6c852a4cf6b0105f701bafefb7"><span offset-key="d03aee6c852a4cf6b0105f701bafefb7:0">Enter a name and a version, then select a schema type and format for your API. You can optionally select the </span>**Import**<span offset-key="d03aee6c852a4cf6b0105f701bafefb7:2"> tab to import an API specification directly from either a local file or a GitHub or Bitbucket repo. If you don't import a schema, Postman will populate your API with a sample specification you can edit at any time.</span></span>

    > <span key="fb81bf9fa85a41a9bb5360b033eb7310"><span offset-key="fb81bf9fa85a41a9bb5360b033eb7310:0">Postman currently supports OpenAPI (versions 1.0, 2.0, and 3.0), RAML (0.8 and 1.0), GraphQL, or WSDL (1.1 and 2.0) schemas. OpenAPI schemas can be defined in JSON or YAML. RAML schemas must be YAML. GraphQL schemas can be JSON or GraphQL SDL. WSDL schemas must be XML. Multi-file variants of schemas are currently not supported.</span></span>

    <span key="10a4192fd42641f29811da71d534ad6f"><span offset-key="10a4192fd42641f29811da71d534ad6f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="28a3c01281ff49419ec0dfec04bf25ac"></span>

    <span key="5114d2f70ed84afe8120c1dec7568f26"><span offset-key="5114d2f70ed84afe8120c1dec7568f26:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

4.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">4.</span>
    <span key="73cd4e0b72b24f63b28c503d2e00100b"><span offset-key="73cd4e0b72b24f63b28c503d2e00100b:0">Select </span>**Create API**<span offset-key="73cd4e0b72b24f63b28c503d2e00100b:2">.</span></span>

<span key="e7ff457ef6014c16be62cf43bb33011a"><span offset-key="e7ff457ef6014c16be62cf43bb33011a:0">Create API</span></span>

## 

<span key="c631270baaa34655a1d1a8d84cc02f6d"><span offset-key="c631270baaa34655a1d1a8d84cc02f6d:0">Renaming and deleting APIs</span></span>

<span key="ed83f583f99143338162f4f88c8dc970"><span offset-key="ed83f583f99143338162f4f88c8dc970:0">You can rename, delete, or remove the API from the workspace using the </span>**View more actions**<span offset-key="ed83f583f99143338162f4f88c8dc970:2"> (</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="3be9c4308b6e45a1abd570fa20de51e5"></span>

<span key="52445638fbc04f178b524256bb839ba0"><span offset-key="52445638fbc04f178b524256bb839ba0:0">) menu in the left sidebar.</span></span>

> <span key="9d6b3931f48c40579d7067b45459d9c5"><span offset-key="9d6b3931f48c40579d7067b45459d9c5:0">When you delete an API or remove it from a workspace, the collections, monitors, mocks, and environments linked to it will not be deleted or removed.</span></span>

<span key="e495298f18ff4f35bae5cac168957899"><span offset-key="e495298f18ff4f35bae5cac168957899:0">Edit API</span></span>

# 

<span key="04f83f4e9e14496eb5ececd1dfcf5711"><span offset-key="04f83f4e9e14496eb5ececd1dfcf5711:0">Authorizing requests</span></span>

<span key="61689505077c490085978b67783fdf14"><span offset-key="61689505077c490085978b67783fdf14:0">APIs use authorization to ensure that client requests access data securely. This can involve authenticating the sender of a request and verifying that they have permission to access or manipulate the relevant data. If you're building an API, you can choose from a variety of auth models. If you're integrating a third-party API, the required authorization will be specified by the API provider.</span></span>

<span key="7f59139f76f6469da5f42077da3e69a6"><span offset-key="7f59139f76f6469da5f42077da3e69a6:0">You can pass auth details along with any request you send in Postman. Auth data can be included in the header, body, or as parameters to a request. If you enter your auth details in the </span>**Authorization**<span offset-key="7f59139f76f6469da5f42077da3e69a6:2"> tab, Postman will automatically populate the relevant parts of the request for your chosen auth type. You can use variables and collections to define authorization details more safely and efficiently, letting you reuse the same information in multiple places.</span></span>

            <span key="320bddd96e494fed9ff53b498a6b1127"><span offset-key="320bddd96e494fed9ff53b498a6b1127:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#client-credentials" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="aa190620049a40d8ab56c0ff6e1ed29a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="d1f61fc72a97407ba00be369549998ff"><span data-offset-key="d1f61fc72a97407ba00be369549998ff:0">Client credentials</span></span></span></a><span key="cda627a7d3d04a3c97fa6e2fdbe0d5b3"><span offset-key="cda627a7d3d04a3c97fa6e2fdbe0d5b3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

            <span key="5a8b06d9f5db4fe2a1c5cb05b9e240bf"><span offset-key="5a8b06d9f5db4fe2a1c5cb05b9e240bf:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#requesting-an-oauth-20-token" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="66d4a7b092954d479357e9b25e50e8a9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="e68de4ee9e264b72b7bb716e308cba73"><span data-offset-key="e68de4ee9e264b72b7bb716e308cba73:0">Requesting an OAuth 2.0 token</span></span></span></a><span key="8882ba209b824a15811247e6ac52011f"><span offset-key="8882ba209b824a15811247e6ac52011f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

            -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

                <span key="af0ecbcff11b41ae9979a5042db6cb94"><span offset-key="af0ecbcff11b41ae9979a5042db6cb94:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#configuration-options-tab" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="36f88f6e3a5d4abe8f9588ea9f7929c7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="031705b4a266425ebc763aa28453ca09"><span data-offset-key="031705b4a266425ebc763aa28453ca09:0">Configuration Options tab</span></span></span></a><span key="5c261fb2cb28423ca624297b6eea9f27"><span offset-key="5c261fb2cb28423ca624297b6eea9f27:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        <span key="f6d2aa5d249a4749886c1cf93ca97137"><span offset-key="f6d2aa5d249a4749886c1cf93ca97137:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#hawk-authentication" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1ef30c07512d4938b62661729e357675" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="51b306df2ea94901988bdffbc526e32a"><span data-offset-key="51b306df2ea94901988bdffbc526e32a:0">Hawk authentication</span></span></span></a><span key="f827e19a45d34bc1b12b72764ed3fc98"><span offset-key="f827e19a45d34bc1b12b72764ed3fc98:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        <span key="5d1d35058fff47b3b1caf382afd99dfa"><span offset-key="5d1d35058fff47b3b1caf382afd99dfa:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#aws-signature" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="74835a6e6fcf47819b563478adfe73b8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="42215e80fb6b412884edfa40e173bfd2"><span data-offset-key="42215e80fb6b412884edfa40e173bfd2:0">AWS Signature</span></span></span></a><span key="68f2038f2d4c4b5c96daa4d122cd3f3e"><span offset-key="68f2038f2d4c4b5c96daa4d122cd3f3e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        <span key="7f60073d84ad43fd8209d9c0cfb25603"><span offset-key="7f60073d84ad43fd8209d9c0cfb25603:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#ntlm-authentication" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b7e3686a342e480a967d90793b974aee" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="c54bf573c6584d97b9d2cc22ee743633"><span data-offset-key="c54bf573c6584d97b9d2cc22ee743633:0">NTLM authentication</span></span></span></a><span key="5d596a32bfc34bb08202e8b1530cec2a"><span offset-key="5d596a32bfc34bb08202e8b1530cec2a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

        <span key="2c563de470f44dc2a47ce78d263d64cc"><span offset-key="2c563de470f44dc2a47ce78d263d64cc:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learning.postman.com/docs/sending-requests/authorization/#akamai-edgegrid" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e15e9ebc3d0f43919c341520e33d8639" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-42661_259-42662-237__"><span data-key="125e5c86d81c4b7ea501a08d7bf13b25"><span data-offset-key="125e5c86d81c4b7ea501a08d7bf13b25:0">Akamai EdgeGrid</span></span></span></a><span key="6e0c3c83246f47bfa415b1e4a5fd7bb9"><span offset-key="6e0c3c83246f47bfa415b1e4a5fd7bb9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>
